delta:
I will not delete anything until you explicitly approve. Before I proceed, please confirm a few details so I can act safely and correctly:

1. What exactly do you want deleted? (files, folders, database rows, cloud storage, account, etc.)  
2. Where is it stored? (local machine — OS, cloud provider/service, server, database type)  
3. Scope: permanent erase vs move to trash/recycle bin vs archive.  
4. Do you want a backup/export first? (recommended if recovery may be needed)  
5. Are there time constraints or a scheduled time to perform this?  
6. Any dependencies or related systems that could be affected?

I can’t directly access your devices unless you give me access or run commands I provide. If you want me to proceed after you supply the details, please give explicit approval by replying exactly with:

"I approve deletion of [brief description of the data]."

(Replace the bracketed text with the data description.) I will only proceed after receiving that exact confirmation.
